import React, { useState} from "react"; import { ToggleButton , Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import ButtonGroup from "reactstrap/es/ButtonGroup"; import './home.css'; function Home() { const [radioValue, setRadioValue] = useState('1'); const radios = [ { name: 'Wallet 1', value: '1' }, { name: 'Wallet 2', value: '2' }, { name: 'Wallet 3', value: '3' }, ]; return(

Welcome to WaaS Portal

Your Current wallets:

Your Current Balance : Rs.10,000.00



) } export default Home;
